title: Join our community!
body:
Find people in your elo, (all elos welcome) Find new friends, new people to play with, duo, trios, and even join up in making 5 man ranked teams. If we get enough people in our community we will do scrims and tournaments against each other, and even RP prizes if it's possible.

https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFpoTjrKQ

For those of you unsure how discord works, you can either download the app or just paste this link in your browser! Thank you!
